snippet: Disappointing financial forecasts from technology companies and a downturn in theS.& P. 500 emphasized concerns that a recent rally was losing momentum.
abstract: Stocks fall again amid disappointing financial forecasts from technology companies and crucial downturn of Standard & Poor's 500-stock index.
lead_paragraph: Disappointing financial forecasts from technology companies and a downturn in theS.& P. 500 emphasized concerns that a recent rally was losing momentum.

headline.seo: Questions Remain as Market Falls for Second Day
headline.main: Soft Outlook for Earnings Feeds a Market Retreat
headline.print_headline: Soft Outlook for Earnings Feeds a Market Retreat
